buginformation.summary: void function wrongly identified having side effects
buginformation.description: this code results the execution the function and should not identified having side effects you mean function what sort side effect does that have sorry had typed the expression into the summary like this for brevity even the function has body still stripped void function global true try removing the void keyword doesn what you think does here void function undefined and this case side effect free undefined will throw sorry but you are mistaken the void operator consumes statement and returns undefined the result the statement this case function which defines function statement and then executes returning the result void which returns undefined void function undefined does not throw error but you not using the result then why you need the void keyword think just need better messaging here what part the code has side effects this just idiom used make function expression rather than statement that can invoked the same expression you are right that the return value the void expression redundant and could replaced without side effect definite bug here though that code that marked having side effects removed higher compression levels and this case removing the function incorrect unless the body the function also has side effects this just idiom used make function expression rather than statement that can invoked the same expression this seems like odd idiom void seems like confusing substitute for putting parentheses around the function definite bug here though that code that marked having side effects removed higher compression levels and this case removing the function incorrect unless the body the function also has side effects agreed this issue was closed revision 1248 issue 515 has been merged into this issue
